participant_1.background:
I like people who are understanding of my diet and phobia.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
i am from georgia.

participant_2.background:
I'm a free spirit who enjoys the simple things in life, like wearing flip flops.
I love my pets very much and enjoy spending time with them.
Baseball helps me to relax and temporarily forget about my anxiety.
i just got my rejection letter from the gifted program.
I have a secret tattoo that my dad would hate.

content.text: Hi there, how are you?
Hey, good! Just got a rejection letter from the gifted program.
Oh no, sorry to hear that.
Thank you. I love baseball though, it helps me relax.
I love baseball too. I used to play in high school.
That's awesome! I've always been a tomboy, so playing baseball was a natural fit for me.
I'm from Georgia, so I'm a big Braves fan.
I love the Braves! They're my favorite team too.
That's great! Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a dog and a cat.
That's awesome! I love pets. I have a dog and a cat too.
What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are great names!
Thank you! How old are your pets?
My dog is 10 years old and my cat is 8 years old.
Wow, they're both senior citizens!
I know, right? They're still going strong though.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that.
Thank you. I'm glad to hear that you're a Braves fan too.
